Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a pale red-brown pottery grooved vessel, the fabric is partially grey in section, the exterior is covered with a reddish slip and remains of one line of Coptic text written in black ink.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394593) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394593)
